post.body: I think my tatts are all in my head. well, that doesn't sound right.
I love much of the music on World Cafe. Wunderbar if you can succeed w/independents & alternatives, locals!
yes it was due wichita 10:17, delayed till 10:40, then never showed...am looking for info on its arrival this morning
I'll try to match your 3.5 pounds a month...and raise you 2 ounces. Does that sound right for poker?
what an adorable photo!
yum. I like ginger and curry sauces together on pork w/lotsa veggies!
I've decided to keep Christmas deco. up...maybe ALL January. Was too busy to enjoy it during the actual holiday! & it's byootiful
gentrification is still blocks away, darn it! And I don't think I can hang on till it reaches us.
oh. I don't have any tattoos.
Deciding whether 2 go 2 gym in the morning. brrr. WILL lose min of 2 lbs this wk, even if I have 2 shave head, cut nails, & remove tattoos.
AirtranFlight 687 from KC will arrive 0800 hrs. Our people will be sleeping on the airpt floor about now. Airtran providing snacks. Wooo.
2 minutes till landing, 4 miles to go
Watching FlightAware.com, Live Flight Tracker
They are less than 10 mi from KC airpt now
The airport is socked in. We awaited 10:17pm arrival for 2 hours. The flight #687, already late out of ATL, circled, then diverted to KC
http://twitpic.com/yj8f - Backyard Composite
mr gorillachild is pretty well-trained these days; i can focus on other things in 09. I don't think he's doing 2 well with my training, tho
urrrk...we've all got issue to work on in 2009, right? Tomorrow!? yikes
hi lisagj! fine and how are you?
estimate on roof repairs...megabucks.
